name: Harith Kavish
description: AI Developer and Full-Stack Engineer specializing in machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, and intelligent application development. Expert in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and modern web technologies.

name: SkinNet Analyzer
description: Advanced AI-powered skin condition detection and analysis system using deep learning and convolutional neural networks. Provides real-time skin health assessment with high accuracy. Built with TensorFlow and deployed as a web application for easy access.

name: Object Detector
description: Multi-object detection application powered by YOLO (You Only Look Once) algorithm for real-time object recognition, classification, and localization. Capable of detecting multiple objects simultaneously with high speed and accuracy.
